description: Software for analyzing Lattice Lightsheet data with the ability to create end to end image analysis by integrating custom workflows. napari-lattice has a fully featured CLI (lls-core) and a napari plugin. Documentation can be found at: https://bioimageanalysiscorewehi.github.io/napari_lattice/
title: napari-lattice
